stanza.line: When most I wink then do mine eyes best seesee
For all the day they view things unrespectedunrespected
But when I sleep in dreams they look on theethee
And darkly bright are bright in dark directeddirected
Then thou whose shadow shadows doth make brightbright
How would thy shadow form form happy showshow
To the clear day with thy much clearer lightlight
When to unseeing eyes thy shade shines soso
How would (I say) mine eyes be blessed mademade
By looking on thee in the living dayday
When in dead night thy fair imperfect shadeshade
Through heavy sleep on sightless eyes doth staystay
All days are nights to see till I see theethee
And nights bright days when dreams do show thee meme
